Package com.scooterframework.transaction

Interface Summary
ImplicitTransactionManager ImplicitTransactionManager interface specified services that are related to managing a transaction which is started implicitly within a service method.
Transaction Transaction interface provides methods for managing transaction boundaries.
TransactionManager TransactionManager interface specified services that are related to managing a transaction.
TransactionStarterType TransactionStarterType interface specified methods about transaction starter.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTransactionImpl AbstractTransactionImpl class has common methods.
CmtTransaction CmtTransaction class allows container to control transaction.
JdbcTransaction JdbcTransaction class
JtaTransaction JtaTransaction class
ThreadLocalTransactionManager ThreadLocalTransactionManager class implements TransactionStarterType, TransactionManager and ImplicitTransactionManager interfaces.
TransactionFactory TransactionFactory class creates Transaction instances of different types.
TransactionManagerUtil TransactionManagerUtil class creates one TransactionManager instance for the whole application.
TransactionUtil TransactionUtil class provides convenient methods about transaction.
